thread.title: Peter Richardson
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Peter Richardson

author: Peter Richardson
title: Peter Richardson
text: I have made heaps and heaps of orders through Banggood and never had a problem. The prices are terrific and the shipping times are never too bad (about 1.5 - 2 weeks to Australia). I use banggood mostly for multicopter bits and bobs - for which it is terrific. Only on rare occasion have I had any trouble with an item not arriving or arriving with a part missing. But every time I have emailed the customer service department they were always really helpful and would offer a solution. Perhaps the only negative is that the rating system on Banggood is skewed to 5 star reviews and there was controversey over whether banggood was actively removing less than 5 star reviews. Although it is possible that this is no longer the case. However, it wasn't such a problem as usually you could just give a 5 star review and write anything you like in a detailed review. Overall though, highly recommend to use Banggood as it is a terrific retailer and I don't know how else I would find all of the things which I buy.
